Module hi.verkefni.vidmot
Package hi.verkefni.vidmot

Class ViewSwitcher

java.lang.Object
hi.verkefni.vidmot.ViewSwitcher
public class ViewSwitcher extends Object
The ViewSwitcher class is a singleton class that manages the switching of views in the application.
